name: Don't Reinvent The Wheel
description: Always research and use widely supported, popular, or industry standard open source solutions, libraries, frameworks, or packages before generating a custom implementation. Only create new solutions if no suitable, well-supported open source alternative exists.

rules: Before implementing a new tool, feature, or function, search for existing open source solutions.
If a suitable, well-supported, and widely adopted solution exists, prefer using it over custom code.
Document the research process and rationale if a new solution is created.
Periodically review custom implementations for possible replacement with open source alternatives.
